author: GameSpot
description:
In this week's Spot On, Lucy and Tamoor discuss the current state of extraction shooters, and get keen insight from Arc Raider's design director Virgil Watkins.

#spoton #gamespot
title: Why Is Everyone Making Extraction Shooters?

author: GameSpot
description:

title: Why You Should Play Silent Hill 4: The Room In 2025 | Gotcha Covered
